t: Prayer for the Peace of Jerusalem.
A Song of Ascents, of David.
I*pn was glad when they said to me, “Let*ln us go to the house of the Lord.”*s
Our*ln feet are standing Within*ln your gates, O Jerusalem,
Jerusalem,*ln that is built As*ln a city that is compact together;
To*ln which the tribes go up, even the tribes of the Lord—*s An*ln ordinance for Israel— To*ln give thanks to the name of the Lord.*s
For*ln there thrones were set for judgment, The*ln thrones of the house of David.
Pray*ln for the peace of Jerusalem: “May*ln they prosper who love you.
May*ln peace be within your walls, And*ln prosperity within your palaces.”
For*ln the sake of my brothers and my friends, I*ln will now say, “May peace be within you.”
For*ln the sake of the house of the Lord*s our God, I*ln will seek your good.
